useCase: Detecting content from diffusion models including Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, and Midjourney
mechanism: Analyzes high-frequency residuals that correlate with the iterative denoising process of diffusion models. Examines spatial correlations in noise patches and detects characteristic patterns from the VAE decoder used in latent diffusion architectures.
accuracy: High - 86-94% for major diffusion model families (SD 1.5/XL, DALL-E 3, Midjourney v5+)
name: Diffusion Model Detection
source: Corvi et al. (2023) - On The Detection of Synthetic Images Generated by Diffusion Models
algorithm: Diffusion Step Residual Analysis + Latent Pattern Detection
parameters: Analysis window: 64x64, Noise extraction: Wiener filter, Correlation map: spatial autocorrelation, VAE decoder pattern: block-periodic
description: Detects artifacts specific to diffusion-based AI models (Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, Midjourney) by analyzing denoising step residuals and latent space patterns.
